entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
